quote: The select natures who pant after the ideal, and find nothing in pantaloons or petticoats great enough to command their reverence and love, are curiously in unison with the narrowest and pettiest.
quote_letters: THE SELECT NATURES WHO PANT AFTER THE IDEAL AND FIND NOTHING IN PANTALOONS OR PETTICOATS GREAT ENOUGH TO COMMAND THEIR REVERENCE AND LOVE ARE CURIOUSLY IN UNISON WITH THE NARROWEST AND PETTIEST
